note:
Cybersecurity specialist, consulting producer, & general space geek.

I work at the intersection of online identity, security, & privacy. I've been an EMT, astrophysicist, science teacher, special effects designer, and TV producer. I earned 3 Super Bowl rings working for the New England Patriots and was an extra in "Star Wars: The Force Awakens". I also helped produce the indie sci-fi film "Norman", and am Executive Producer for Cosmic Perspective.
